article_title: HP's Conway Growth Linked to Medicaid
article_text: The biggest player in Medicaid processing is Hewlett-Packard Co. of Palo Alto, Calif., and Arkansas is one of its customers, to the tune of $46.8 million in the current fiscal year. Now, HP's center in Conway plans to add 200 people to staff its health care work.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news

Now, HP's center in Conway plans to add 200 people to staff its health care work.
The biggest player in Medicaid processing is Hewlett-Packard Co. of Palo Alto, Calif., and Arkansas is one of its customers, to the tune of $46.8 million in the current fiscal year.
